name: All-Knowing Armor
Obtained:
The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story
Elden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Robe
Special: Strengthens thorn sorcery
Obtained: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Aristocrat Coat
Obtained: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

name: Aristocrat Garb
Obtained: Dropped by Undead Soldiers

name: Astrologer Robe
Obtained:
Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Azur's Glintstone Robe
Obtained:
After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Primeval Sorcerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Robe will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Garb
Obtained:
Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.        Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. 
Elden Ring Map here        Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

name: Banished Knight Armor
Obtained: Dropped by Banished Knights

name: Beast Champion Armor
Obtained:
Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Black Knife Armor
Special: Wearer's movement becomes silent, Rolls, jumping and walking make no noise
Obtained:
Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Armor
Obtained: Drop from Blackflame Monks.

name: Bloodhound Knight Armor
Obtained:
The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Cloth Vest
Obtained:
Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.        Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria).
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Silver Mail Armor
Obtained: Drop from Albinauric archers at Ordina, Liturgical Town.

name: Briar Armor
Special: Deals damage when rolling into targets. Damage increases exponentially with more briar pieces
Obtained: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

name: Bull-Goat Armor
Obtained:
Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Armor
Obtained:
Found in a chest behind Sorceress Sellen, in Ruined Cellar, Post Town Remains.        You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Elden Ring Map here        To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

name: Chain Armor
Obtained:
Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal√©. It costs 1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here        Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing.

name: Chain-Draped Tabard
Obtained: Dropped by Soldiers.

name: Champion Pauldron
Obtained:
Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Armor
Obtained: Drops from Cleanrot Knights in Inner Aeonia, Caelid.

name: Cloth Garb
Obtained:
Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth Trousers.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Commoner's Garb
Special: +1 Faith
Obtained: Dropped by Commoner enemies found in Stormveil Castle, Leyndell, Royal Capital, and other areas of the map.

name: Commoner's Simple Garb
Special: +1 Faith
Obtained:
Location: Stormveil Castle.
Elden Ring Map here        Looted off a corpse that is located at the balcony of the inner gatehouse of the castle's main gate. The safest way to reach this room is by entering through the back of the castle since the enemies that are guarding the main gate and the front won't expect you to be coming in from behind.

name: Confessor Armor
Obtained:
Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Axe Armor

Obtained:
Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis.

name: Crucible Tree Armor
Special: Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
Obtained:
The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Cuckoo Surcoat
Obtained: Drops from Raya Lucarian Soldiers        Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Deathbed Dress
Special: Slowly replenishes the HP of nearby allies, but not that of the wearer.
Obtained:
Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Depraved Perfumer Robe
Obtained: Acquire this from the enemy directly up the hill from the site of grace at the Village of the Albinaurics. He is the enemy who wields fire, you may have to kill him a few times to get it.        The Depraved Perfumer Set can also be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

name: Eccentric's Armor
Obtained:
Drops for defeating Witch-Hunter Jerren.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Armor
Obtained: Available from Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Erdtree Surcoat
Obtained: The Erdtree Surcoat Chest Armor occasionally drops from Leyndell Soldiers.

name: Errant Sorcerer Robe
Obtained:
Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Exile Armor
Obtained: Dropped by Castle Guards

name: Eye Surcoat
Obtained:
Eye Surcoat can be found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy Boss. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Fia's Robe
Obtained: Found on Fia's location after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon Fortissax.

name: Fia's Robe (Altered)
Obtained: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Fia's Robe if you have it in your possession.

name: Fell Omen Cloak
Obtained: The Fell Omen Cloak Chest Armor can be purchased from Enia in the Roundtable Hold after the player has defeated Morgott.

name: Finger Maiden Robe
Obtained:
Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Armor
Obtained: Pieces of the Fire Monk armor set are dropped by Fire Monk Abbots found at a few camps and patrols in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Fur Raiment
Obtained: Dropped by Ancestral Follower

name: Gelmir Knight Armor
Obtained:
You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Armor
Obtained: Dropped by Godrick Knights.

name: Godskin Apostle Robe
Obtained:
Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
Obtained: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost

name: Haligtree Crest Surcoat
Obtained: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Highwayman Cloth Armor
Obtained: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

name: Hoslow's Armor
Obtained:
All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.        Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
Obtained:
Collect the Resurrection Painting from the Artist's Shack in eastern Liurnia. 
Elden Ring Map Link        With the painting on hand, head to the graveyard area east of Caria Manor. This location is only accessible after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta. The item is found by touching a ghost sitting on a chair at the graveyard. The ghost disappears as soon as you touch it and the Juvenile Scholar Robe will appear on the ground along with a Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1 x Larval Tear. 
Elden Ring Map Link

name: Knight Armor
Obtained: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  4,500 Runes.

name: Kaiden Armor
Obtained: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

name: Land of Reeds Armor

name: Leather-Draped Tabard

name: Lionel's Armor

name: Lord of Blood's Robe

name: Malformed Dragon Armor

Can be obtained from killing the Tree Sentinel up the stairs from the Beside the Great Bridge site of grace.

name: Maliketh's Armor

name: Marais Robe

name: Old Aristocrat Gown
Obtained: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.

name: Omenkiller Robe
Obtained:
Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Long Gloves and Omenkiller Boots.

name: Perfumer's Traveling Garb

name: Preceptor's Long Gown

name: Raging Wolf Armor

name: Raya Lucarian Robe

name: Rotten Gravekeeper Cloak

name: Sage Robe

name: Dirty Chainmail
Obtained: Dropped by the Second Generation Albinaurics that are visibly wearing the chest piece.        An easily farmable group of 4 is located near the Academy Gate Town site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Head northwest from the site of grace until you reach an L-shaped building with a small tower at the corner. There will be 2 on the left sloped roof and 2 near the tower that can all drop the chest.

name: Drake Knight Armor
Obtained:
You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.        Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest. 
[Elden Ring Map here]

name: Goldmask's Rags
Obtained:
Can all be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find his set (Except for the Helmet) on his body. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Gravekeeper Cloak
Obtained: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

Obtained: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Lord of Blood's Robe into Lord of Blood's Robe (Altered).

name: Lusat's Robe
Obtained:
All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Malenia's Armor
Obtained: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

name: Malenia's Armor (Altered)
Obtained: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Malenia's Armor into Malenia's Armor (Altered).

name: Maliketh's Armor (Altered)
Obtained: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Maliketh's Armor into Maliketh's Armor (Altered).

name: Mausoleum Knight Armor
Obtained: Mausoleum Knight Set Pieces are randomly dropped by the Mausoleum Knights. Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace. Also found near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

name: Mausoleum Knight Armor (Altered)
Obtained: Mausoleum Knight Set Pieces are randomly dropped by the Mausoleum Knights. Typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace. Also found near the Walking Mausoleum in Weeping Peninsula.

name: Mausoleum Surcoat
Obtained: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.        An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

name: Night Maiden Armor
Obtained: Pieces of the Night Maiden Set are dropped by Night Maiden enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.        Two can be found in the Night's Sacred Ground area in the church with the large Silver Tear Ball. Once this building's shortcut is opened these two can be easily farmed by resetting at the Night's Sacred Ground site of grace.

name: Night's Cavalry Armor
Obtained:
You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Night's Cavalry Armor (Altered)
Obtained: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Night's Cavalry Armor, if you have it in your possession.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery
Obtained:
In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.         After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, crossing the narrow fallen rafter directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Finery and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set. 
Elden Ring Map here        To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Finery (Altered)
Obtained: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Nomadic Merchant's Finery, if you have it in your possession.

name: Nox Monk Armor
Obtained:
Can be looted from the Nox Swordstress and Nox Priest common ennemies in Nokstella, Eternal City. However, note that the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery will not drop the set. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map link

name: Nox Monk Armor (Altered)
Obtained: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Monk Armor into Nox Monk Armor (Altered).

name: Nox Swordstress Armor
Obtained: Pieces of the Nox Swordstress Set are dropped by Nox Swordstress enemies found in Nokron and Nokstella.        Three can be found in relatively close proximity to the Nokstella, Eternal City site of grace. One up the stairs in a side room, and 2 in the river riding giant ants.

name: Nox Swordstress Armor (Altered)
Obtained: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Nox Swordstress Armor into Nox Swordstress Armor (Altered

name: Official's Attire
Obtained:
From the Forbidden Lands site of grace, turn back and head towards the elevator. Face southwest before activating the elevator, and then watch for an opening to jump off into. The Official's Attire is on the corpse in this hidden hallway, alongside Blade of Calling. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Omen Armor
Special: Increases damage of Omen Bairn and Regal Omen Bairn
Obtained:
The Omen Set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at Leyndell Royal Capital. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Page Garb
Obtained: The Page Garb Chest Armor can be occasionally found as loot drops from Page enemies Three are easily found behind the Royal Moongazing Grounds site of grace in Carian Manor. They are also scattered throughout Leyndell, Royal Capital and at Tombsward Ruins at the Underground.

name: Page Garb (Altered)
Obtained: Tombsward Ruins Underground. See it on the Elden Ring Map Here.        Boc the Seamster can alter the original Page Garb, if you have it in your possession.

name: Royal Remains Armor
